title: 112_hr3800
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. The Act also extends the expenditure authority of the Trust Fund until February 18, 2012. The Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012 extends funding for the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. Amendments include changes to authorization of appropriations and project grant authority. The Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012 extends funding for the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. Amendments include changes to authorization of appropriations and project grant authority, as well as extensions of expiring authorities in various sections of the title 49, United States Code. The text chunk discusses amendments to various sections of the title 49, United States Code, changing dates from January 31, 2012, to February 17 or 18, 2012. Additionally, funding for the Federal Aviation Administration operations is specified until February 17, 2012. The text chunk amends funding amounts for various sections of the title 49, United States Code, extending the period until February 17, 2012. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
